text: Ewan meriven ku ji bona zoya (xwe ra, eva zinakar; dibeje) hene! Heke ji bona wan ra ji wan pestir qe tu nihrewan tune be, berewaniya wan aha ne; her yek ji wan nihrewaniya xwe we aha bide: Car caran her yek ji wan we aha beje, "Bi Yezdan ez sond dixum, ku ez (di ve gotina xwe da) ji rastbeja me
